alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; San Jacinto; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:23PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Montgomery, west central San Jacinto and southeastern Walker Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 522 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Panorama Village, or over Willis, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conroe, southeastern Huntsville, Willis, Panorama Village, New Waverly, Huntsville State Park, Lake Conroe Dam and Evergreen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Lake Conroe, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
